column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Service was good.  The chicken pomegranate dish and the tortilla were pretty tasty
column2: but the other dishes (the lamb kebab stands out in my mind) was far too oily.  The dessert (caramelized banana) was nothing to write home about.  All in all
column3: the food was meh.  Atmosphere was of a similar sentiment.  Both good
